items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: 七圣召唤 Lite，「原神」同人游戏。相比原版「七圣召唤」，具有轻量化、高自由度等特点。 ／ GITCG Lite is a "Genshin Impact" Doujin game. It is lightweight and highly customizable compared to the original game.

items.content_html: wc-hash-router is a lightweight and versatile hash-based router library designed specifically for web components. Empower your web applications with seamless navigation and dynamic content loading, all while maintaining clean and modular code with the power of web components.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.

items.content_html: TaskMate is a simple and effective Todo List app built with React and Vite. It lets users add, toggle, and remove tasks, with smooth notifications via React Toastify. Ideal for anyone looking for a lightweight, functional project for task management.
items.title: Amartyakaushik/TaskMate: TaskMate is a simple and effective Todo List app built with React and Vite. It lets users add, toggle, and remove tasks, with smooth notifications via React Toastify. Ideal for anyone looking for a lightweight, functional project for task management.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
